Prince William's wife Kate in labor

Palace officials said the Duchess of Cambridge was admitted early Monday to the same London hospital where Princess Diana gave birth to William and his younger brother, Prince Harry. Follow these live updates from royal watchers, social media, and more.

Federal budget cuts take their toll in Mass.

Federal workers in the Bay State are losing as much as 30 percent of their salaries to comply with a law aimed at reducing the federal deficit, even as in-state job growth has slowed recently.
  • DoD feels budget cuts, too
  • 7/5 Cuts affect Natick workers

Woman dies after being hit by Red Line train

An 80-year-old from Brockton was struck by an MBTA train on the tracks of the Kendall/MIT station on Sunday, interrupting service at several busy stops, according to T authorities.

Software helps the blind
see — via smartphones

The Visus Visual Assist System provides visual and audio aids to blind people using the camera and other devices on a cellphone.

protection from lightning

to cut suicide rate
